tool.name: Create decoy databases
tool.description: Creates a random protein database with similar properties to a real protein database

param.name: input_file
param.label: Input File
param.help: Real protein sequences. Take care that these are fasta formatted with no more than 80 amino acids per line. There should be no whitespace in the sequences.

param.name: prefix
param.label: String to prepend to generated protein ID's

param.name: length
param.label: Number of random sequences to generate
param.help: If 0, a database of equal size to the input database will be generated

param.name: append
param.label: Append input dataset to the generated sequences
